componentTagName.name: Checkbox
componentTagName.APIdescription: Checkbox component has a range of properties, attributes etc. to define the experience in different use cases and it can be used as the replacement of the html checkbox

componentTagName.name: Checkbox group
componentTagName.APIdescription: Checkbox group component has a range of properties to define the experience in different use cases and it is a kind of wrapper for multiple checkboxes.
